Description: Sends a message to Progbot's bug report channel
Normal: 5d6>4 or N5; Comment: #, Keep high/low: 2d6h1/2d6l1, Explode: 5d6!6 (opt: repeat X times)
Lookup Viruses' descriptions (opt: detailed for full statblocks)
Lookup a BattleChip or Power tag
Lookup a Bond Power, help, or rule
Roll Mystery Data (opt: chips_ncp_only for MysteryRewards!)
Roll Crimson Noise Mystery Data (Genso Network)
Spend/add Cheers (1: random one, 2: pick one, 5: pick a MegaCheer)
Spend/add Jeers (1: random one, 2: pick one, 5: pick a MegaJeer)
Select random Viruses (opt: # of strikers, artillery, etc. to roll, enable Mega/Omega Viruses)
Pull up the Player-Made Repository Link
Generate a randomized adventure scenario prompt! (opt: chaos for a longer prompt)
Generate a randomized Navi boss fight prompt!
Manage Spotlight Tracker (opt: names separated by commas, command is 'mark' by default)
Set down a Safety Tool during play
Find a BattleChip, NCP, or Power
Test slash command via a ping
Test ProgBot's randomness! (256 is normal, 200+ is good!)
